message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this small slice of the pie and we can both walk away happy.
Alice, that's not a generous offer, let's be fair.  I propose a 60/40 split.
Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a larger share this time, but we need to reach an agreement soon. Time is running out.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  We're losing money with every wasted round.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution.
